DOC.brief_summary: Our objective is to determine the metabolic availability of Lysine in white maize using the indicator amino acid oxidation (IAAO) technique in adult men.
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Availability of Lysine From White Maize
DOC.detailed_description: Our objective is to determine the metabolic availability of Lysine in white maize. 7 young, healthy, male adults will receive graded levels (29, 37,46 and 54%) of lysine requirement of 35 mg/kg/d as a crystalline AA mixture and a porridge of white cornmeal protein respectively.
DOC.criteria: Healthy Adult males (2049 years old) A history of recent weight loss or illness Use of any medication at the time of entry into the study
